Package com.xebisco.yield.physics

Klasse RayCast

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.physics.RayCast
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
org.jbox2d.callbacks.RayCastCallback
public class RayCast extends Object implements org.jbox2d.callbacks.RayCastCallback
It's a callback that is used to get information about a ray-cast
